d.phase: Hello there! How are you? I'm feeling GREAT today!
d.a: No, I'm a little under the weather today
I want to be a sponsor!
d.phase: The young girl wanders off. It would appear she has no time for unhappy people....

[Ah, you want to sponsor a future Dinoz master?] [It's awesome, but unfortunately you can't start right now, the sponsorship system is temporarily unavailable. Don't worry, it'll be back soon, with an awesome surprise for Dinoz masters that take part!]
I've found a way to earn loads of gold coins! Do you know how the *Sponsorship* system works? It's an easy way to become a millionaire in gold coins, like me!

It's really simple: just ask to your friends to sign up to DinoRPG. For each friend you refer who signs up and starts playing, you'll receive a "Sponsor Ticket" which will be placed in your inventory! These tickets give you the possibility to win many treasures!
Yes, once you obtain a Sponsor Ticket you can go and use it in the Market Place. You'll be able to *dig* one square per Ticket and maybe unearth a big *Treasure*!

Most Sponsor Tickets will give you gold coins, but some people say that there is a possibility of finding an extremely rare Dinoz Egg, which is especially powerful! In any case, it's desired by all Dinoz Masters....
To learn how to sponsor other players, simply read the *Sponsor Manual* I wrote, you'll find all information you couls possibly need!
d.a: Thanks, I'll take a look now!
